timeline.message: Migrate Query Workbench to new Platform  (#812)
Updated workbench snapshots to fix broken workflow (#823)
For ODFE 1.12 change position for sql workbench plugin
For ODFE 1.12 change position for sql workbench plugin

Add Error Message for Explain and Run (#872)

Added error messages for `Explain` aside from empty box. More detail in error messages for invalid queries on `Run`
revert Run error to raw json and simplify Explain error (#889)

Remove workbench side nav logo and fix download link (#869)

* Fix download link in package description (#729)

* remove logo for side bar

Fix issue result table in workbench not displaying values of boolean type (#891)

Fix key "id" in result table issue of the workbench (#890)

* removed key "id" from result table

* removed cache files from PR

* remove unnecessary lines

* fixed search bar

* update

Fix workbench bugs from plugin platform upgrade (#886)

* Fix download json api path

* Fix cypress tests

* Fix response tab margin

* Update cypress tests

* Fix server log message

* Fix asScoped call for security plugin

* Update cypress tests

* Fix unique keys problem

* Remove console log

Disable sorting on workbench (#900)

* Disable sorting on workbench

* Address comments

Bump ini from 1.3.5 to 1.3.7 in /workbench (#911)

Bumps [ini](https://github.com/isaacs/ini) from 1.3.5 to 1.3.7.
- [Release notes](https://github.com/isaacs/ini/releases)
- [Commits](https://github.com/isaacs/ini/compare/v1.3.5...v1.3.7)
